entry.title: Dire Warnings About Maine Gunman Didn't Stop His Rampage
entry.content: Last week’s massacre illustrates how many blind spots remain in the legal and mental health systems.

entry.title: Dozens Killed in Israeli Airstrikes in North Gaza
entry.content: The strikes hit a densely populated area north of Gaza City. The Israeli military said it was targeting Hamas infrastructure and militants, including a commander.

entry.title: Hunger Spreads in Gaza as Israel Tightens Blockade
entry.content: Bakeries are shutting down and essential food supplies are running out due to Israel’s siege of the enclave following Hamas’s deadly Oct. 7 attack.
